name: Children And Youth Unity Foundation

address: Shivganaga Rahivashi Sangh, Dharavi kala killa

briefDescription: Mission: To eradicate drug addiction among children and youth through sportsVision: Reduce drug addiction and develop a healthy community environment for young people through sports resulting in an addiction free and healthy life.Children and Youth Unity Foundation (CYUF) is a registered non-profit organization (E-28729, Mumbai) established in 2010. CYUF is focused on children and youth from difficult backgrounds especially those afflicted by addiction. Started by Rahul Pol, the roots of CYUF come from the founderâ€™s own journey of being a former addict.
